reviews.customers_say: Customers like the cardigan's length, fit, and warmth, noting it hits the ankles and is great for spring. The style and color receive positive feedback, with one customer mentioning it feels and looks great. The material thickness receives mixed reviews, with several customers describing it as thin, and the quality and value for money are also mixed, with some finding it worth the cost while others say it's not worth

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect sweater
items.body: Love love love!!! Perfect length. The sleeves aren’t as slouchy as the picture, but they are great. Just thick enough to keep me warm but not too hot. Super cute with jeans or a dress. Read more
items.author: A greene

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Fall Find!!!
items.body: ABSOLUTELY LOVE THIS SWEATER! It's light weight but warm and stylish. I purchased more colors !!!! Read more
items.author: Customer

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great Fit
items.body: Pros: Great fit , Good Quality, decent material, will purchase in other colors Con: A little thinner than expected. Read more
items.author: DG

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Feels like a warm hug
items.body: Update ... still my favorite long cozy sweater. Color has stayed true. Love love love the length. Rich black color. Well knitted. Jacket cozy, not heavy coat cozy. I'm 5'6 and a half. I falls right above my ankles (roughly 3" or so) without shoes. Quite comfortable. Will update after wash and wear. Excited to wear. Read more
items.author: Private Customer

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Vibrant in color
items.body: I received so many compliments. Just buy it wear it and Work it” it’s worth it extremely satisfied. I plan on buying all the colors Read more
items.author: Judy

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Confused by other reviews???
items.body: I hesitated to order this because there were so many conflicting reviews. I ordered the black in a small. I am about 5'4 and 130 for reference. It is very long and comes to my ankles which is exactly what I wanted. Some reviews said it was shorter than that. It is soft enough. I didn't feel it was "scratchy." It was very wrinkled when I took it from the bag, but I popped it in the dryer for a couple minutes and it took them right out. It is too soon to tell how this washed up or how the wear and tear is. However, EVERY sweater I buy from anywhere always needs a shaver to it after a few wears -- no matter how much I spend. I love the texture of this. I love the dramatic length. I would say order your size as usual. It still fits in a slight slouchy fashion, but not too baggy. Hope this helps others. Read more
items.author: EL47

items.title: 1.0 out of 5 stars Not as Pictured & Not Worth the Price
items.body: This cardigan is not as thick or as long as pictured. Material is cheap and the length of the sweater stops shorter than advertised. For context I am 5'4" Read more
items.author: E.Elle

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve Maxi is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.

The design is easy to style with simple accessories and works well in photos thanks to clean lines and a balanced silhouette.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve Maxi is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: 00 Yellow, 02 Dark Blue, 01 Grey, 01 Pink, 01 Khaki, 01 Orange, 00 Black, 01 Apricot, 01 Coffee, 00 Green. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
